section.title: Itemize
section.p: To tie a shoe lace follow this procedure : 1. Make sure both ends of the lace are even. 2. Cross one end over the other to make an X. 3. Loop one end around the other end. 4. Tuck the end that you just looped under the other end. 5. Pull both ends to tighten the knot. 6. Make a bow by creating a loop with each end. 7. Cross one loop over the other to create an X. 8. Tuck the top loop underneath the bottom loop. 9. Pull both loops to tighten the bow. 10. Adjust the loops and ends to make the bow even.
